page.title: 15PRIMARY SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: {DINNERS at MARLEY HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL At Marley Hill Primary School 96 people have school dinners;87 children, 3 teachers,3 dinner ladies, and 3 kitchen staff.29 children have free dinners.26 children bring sandwiches and 2 go home for dinner. Dinners cost 52p each day. {Menu for the week begining 24.6.1985 {MONDAY-}luncheon meat,pease pudding, chips and almond crunchie tart with custard. {TUESDAY-}roast beef,Yorkshire pudding, cabbage,roast potatoes,and trifle. {WEDNESDAY-}shepherds pie, carrots, crisps,and jam sponge with custard. {THURSDAY-}fish fingers,beetroot,chips and Bermuda banana bread,with milk drink. {FRIDAY- }sausage roll, salad,salad cream,crisps and milk pudding with jam sauce.
